snippet: Bridget Anne Kelly, whose email appears to have instigated the controversial lane closures, has been a part of Gov. Chris Christie’s administration since 2010.
abstract: Bridget Anne Kelly, whose email appears to have instigated the controversial lane closures at George Washington Bridge, is current deputy chief of staff for legislative and intergovernmental affairs for Gov Chris Christie of New Jersey; Kelly has been part of Christie’s administration since 2010, and was promoted to $114,000 a year position in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Bridget Anne Kelly, whose email appears to have instigated the controversial lane closures, has been a part of Gov. Chris Christie’s administration since 2010.

headline.main: Behind Inflammatory Email, Aide With a Low Profile
headline.print_headline: Behind Inflammatory Email, Aide With a Low Profile
